attributes.action: Delay or bring forward the EU Referendum to avoid clashing with EURO 2016
attributes.additional_details: Though they may be able to arrange a proxy or postal vote, this process is not easy for people that should be given every possible encouragement to vote.
attributes.background: This is a hugely important event for the people of the UK, and we have a record 3 teams from the UK participating.  Football is our national sport with thousands of families expected to travel to the tournament in France.
